privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Devinbi collects, uses, and protects your personal data across our digital products and services.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Devinbi, we take the privacy and security of your personal information seriously. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and the choices you have to manage your information.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.description: We collect only the information needed to deliver our services effectively and securely.
items: Contact details such as name, email address, and company information
Project information and requirements shared through our forms or direct communication
Usage data including device information, browser type, and interaction metrics
Technical logs that help us keep our systems secure and reliable

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.description: Your data is used to provide you with the best possible experience and to support our business operations.
items: Delivering and improving our software products and services
Responding to inquiries, proposals, and support requests
Personalizing content, recommendations, and marketing communication
Monitoring, auditing, and protecting our platforms against abuse or fraud

sections.title: Sharing & Disclosure
sections.description: We do not sell your personal information. Data is shared only when necessary.
items: Trusted service providers who help us operate our infrastructure
Professional advisors such as legal and financial consultants
Regulators or authorities when required by law or to protect our rights

sections.title: Your Rights & Choices
sections.description: You have full control over how your information is collected and used.
items: Request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data
Opt out of marketing communications at any time
Restrict certain processing activities where legally applicable
Transfer your data to another provider when technically feasible

sections.title: Data Security & Retention
sections.description: We implement administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to keep your data secure.
items: Encryption and secure transport for data in transit and at rest
Role-based access controls and staff training on data protection
Regular security reviews, vulnerability assessments, and backups
Retention of personal information only as long as needed for our services or legal obligations

contact.title: Questions About This Policy?
contact.description: If you have any questions or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please reach out to our privacy team.
